String.string: [Apex] Uninvited Guests
Seir is about to deliver his speech.

It’s time for the speech.
Go to the stage. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Congratulate Seir. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Questions later! We need to evacuate the survivors."
Talk to {@linkcreature:505#2027#Seir}. [Talk to Nerinder, who's near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"We're evacuating. Seir will lead you out."
Direct the {@linkcreature:505#2012#survivors} to go with Seir. [Talk to Nerinder, who's near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Halran, go with Seir."
Evacuate {@linkcreature:505#2028#Halran}. [Talk to Nerinder, who's near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"I'm on it...but it doesn't look good."
Talk to {@linkcreature:505#2027#Seir}. [Talk to Nerinder, who's near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Search and Rescue
The Dance Floor is torn to shreds.
Search the area for more survivors. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
There have to be more survivors!
You might have missed someone. Search again.
Search the Dance Floor. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"She's gone."
Speak with the {@linkcreature:505#3005#survivors}.
There have to be more survivors!
There are no more survivors...
Speak with the survivors. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Defeat the Dragon in the banquet hall. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"What Black Dragon? Verdas?"
Go see if {@linkcreature:505#3001#Verdas} is still alive. [Talk to Nerinder, who's near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Velika was completely destroyed... how could this be?"
Use the Fate Shard.
You feel something in your pocket. Open your inventory and use the Velika Banquet Coin.
It's the lucky coin from the guessing game. But what about the people?
"I must have... gone back in time?"
Ask the {@linkcreature:63#1132#Guard} what happened to the banquet.
